archimate:Requirement.name: UN_FO_2
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a forecasting duty officer I need to create outputs that are a mixture of textual, graphical and map based information where the recipient can interact with the information being displayed (e.g. see data points on a hydrograph or zoom in/out on a map) so that I can communicate flood forecast information in a way in which the recipient is able to derive greater value by being able to interrogate the information.
